|brand = Sharp |model = WN8522D |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (7-JU) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = August 26, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Sharp_WN8522D_7-JU |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle
|vendor_id = 04dd |device_id = 941f |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = RAXWN8522D7JU |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |oui = 1C:C6:3C, 84:9C:A6
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43236; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/28/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device has (at least) the following '''Sharp''' models... *KI-OUA003WJQZ (84:9C:A6, 1C:C6:3C [http://www.freeimagehosting.net/newuploads/s8y85.png OUI]s) *KI-OUA004WJN1 (84:9C:A6 OUI)
A user seems to have indicated that the driver sets in the infobox do not work with this device. They indicated a [https://www.catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=ae2500 newer driver is available on Windows Update for the AE2500] and that works for this device, when manually installed as an AE2500.
==Links of Interest== [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=1422512 Users Manual]
